alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 12:38AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Jones and Taylor Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1238 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Butman, or 7 miles north of Coronados Camp, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Trent, Noodle, Potosi, View, Hamby, Nugent, Coronados Camp, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Lake Abilene, Camp Tonkawa, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and Hodges. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
